result.title: a c++ code
result.content:
i have searched alot to find where is the wrong in this C++ code from uri cause everytime i put it on uri it gives me wrong answer this is the problem https://www.urionlinejudge.com.br/judge/en/problems/view/1045 and this is my code ` #include 

using namespace std;

    double A,B,C;

    int main ()

   { 

    cin >> A >> B >> C;

if (A >= B+C)

cout <<"NAO FORMA TRIANGULO\n";

else if (A*A == B*B + C*C)

cout <<"TRIANGULO RETANGULO\n";

else if (A*A > B*B + C*C)

cout <<"TRIANGULO OBTUSANGULO\n";

else if (A*A < B*B + C*C)

cout <<"TRIANGULO ACUTANGULO\n";

else if (A==B && B==C && A==C)

cout <<"TRIANGULO EQUILATERO\n";

else if  ((A==B && B!=C ) || (B==C && C!=A ) || (A==C && C!=B ) )

cout <<"TRIANGULO ISOSCELES"<<endl;

return 0;
   }`
